law.catch_line: An applicant who otherwise qualifies for a license under § 14-5E-09(c)(2) of this subtitle is entit...
law.text: An applicant who otherwise qualifies for a license under § 14-5E-09(c)(2) of this subtitle is entitled to be licensed for a single 2-year term before taking the national certifying examination given by the American Board of Cardiovascular Perfusion or its successor organization or another examination given or approved by the Board.
